title: Validate full Kanban planning system
description: Ensure all prior worktrees function correctly, and that the system can be used recursively to test itself.
userStories: As a developer, I want to verify that each feature branch performs as intended.
As a user, I want to know that launching the Planning tab reflects real worktree task states.
successCriteria: Each original feature branch has been tested via UI and console outputs.
Test results are visible or confirmable from the Planning UI.
Planning tab and tasks load and function end-to-end.
